results.title: Clarinet and bass clarinet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the clarinet and bass clarinet are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.description:

results.title: Hardening and tempering carbon steel
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic Metalwork”.
Explains the reasons for and the processes involved in the hardening and tempering of three typical tools manufactured from hard carbon steel: a scraper, a cold chisel, and a screwdriver.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Basic Metalwork”.
Explains the reasons for and the processes involved in the hardening and tempering of three typical tools manufactured from hard carbon steel: a scraper, a cold chisel, and a screwdriver.

results.title: Oboe and coranglais
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the oboe and the coranglais are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them. Musicians: Rosemary Stimson, Jiri Tancibudek.

results.title: Flute and piccolo
results.creator_credit: Malcolm Smith, Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the flute and piccolo are played, their range tone, and how to care for them. Consultant: Verdon Williams (conductor).

results.title: The World of animals: looking at amphibians
results.creator_credit: John Walker and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic Life Science”.
Studies frogs, toads and salamanders to show how amphibians are adapted to spend their early life in water and their adult life on land. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.title_for_label: The World of animals: looking at amphibians
results.description:
Episode of Series “Basic Life Science”.
Studies frogs, toads and salamanders to show how amphibians are adapted to spend their early life in water and their adult life on land. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Untuned percussion
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 11 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians demonstrate how these instruments are played, their range tone, and how they should be cared for.
